dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: Hey everyone, welcome back! So, uh, big news coming out of Kazakhstan this week, huh?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hey everyone, welcome back! So, uh, big news coming out of Kazakhstan this week, huh?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely, Host A. President Xi Jinping, [uh] from China, is making an official visit.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely, Host A. President Xi Jinping, uh from China, is making an official visit.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On June 16-17, at the invitation of President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev, President of the People's Republic of China Xi Jinping will visit Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: Right, right. It’s on June 16th and 17th, I think? Invited by President Tokayev.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, right. It's on June sixteenth and seventeenth, I think? Invited by President Tokayev.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On June 16-17, at the invitation of President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev, President of the People's Republic of China Xi Jinping will visit Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And you can tell Astana is, like, really ready for him. Flags of both countries are, um, everywhere on the main streets.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And you can tell Astana is, like, really ready for him. Flags of both countries are, um, everywhere on the main streets.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In honor of the high-ranking guest’s visit, flags of both countries have been placed on the main streets of Astana.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, I saw that. And, uh, they've really ramped up security too, haven't they?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, I saw that. And, uh, they've really ramped up security too, haven't they?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Enhanced security measures are being implemented in the capital, and some streets have been closed.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, for sure. Enhanced security measures, some streets are actually closed off. So, you know, prepare for that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, for sure. Enhanced security measures, some streets are actually closed off. So, you know, prepare for that.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Enhanced security measures are being implemented in the capital, and some streets have been closed.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: Which means, for anyone in Astana, you really need to, like, plan your route in advance if you're driving or even just walking.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which means, for anyone in Astana, you really need to, like, plan your route in advance if you're driving or even just walking.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Drivers and pedestrians are advised to plan their routes in advance, taking into account possible changes in traffic arrangements.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: [overlaps] Absolutely. Expect some temporary road signs and, uh, diversions, too. It's going to be a bit disruptive.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. Expect some temporary road signs and, uh, diversions, too. It's going to be a bit disruptive.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Temporary road signs and markers will be installed to ensure safety and minimize inconvenience.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: So, what's, uh, what's actually on the agenda for this high-profile visit? Beyond just the optics.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, what's, uh, what's actually on the agenda for this high-profile visit? Beyond just the optics.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, first up, a bilateral meeting. They're looking to deepen that "comprehensive strategic partnership" between Kazakhstan and China.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, first up, a bilateral meeting. They're looking to deepen that comprehensive strategic partnership between Kazakhstan and China.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As previously reported, a bilateral high-level meeting is planned during the Chinese President’s visit, where the sides will discuss further deepening of the Kazakh-Chinese comprehensive strategic partnership.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: That's a big deal, you know? And then on the 17th, Host B, it's that even bigger "Central Asia - China" summit, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's a big deal, you know? And then on the seventeenth, Host B, it's that even bigger Central Asia - China summit, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In addition, on June 17, Astana will host the second "Central Asia - China" summit with the participation of regional heads of state.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: That's the one! With, uh, all the regional heads of state participating. It's a pretty significant gathering for the whole area.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's the one! With, uh, all the regional heads of state participating. It's a pretty significant gathering for the whole area.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In addition, on June 17, Astana will host the second "Central Asia - China" summit with the participation of regional heads of state.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: Sounds like a really, like, packed and important couple of days for the region.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sounds like a really, like, packed and important couple of days for the region.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. Lots of geopolitical implications to watch there, for sure.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. Lots of geopolitical implications to watch there, for sure.
